name: The Ocarina
summary:
主角突然醒来，发现他身处一片森林中。
他不知道为什么？为什么在这里？为什么在这片森林里？
他决心要找到一条出路，但是为什么没有任何指示？

The Ocarina is a game where the player can only wander around a single map, brimming with surprises and illogical chain of events that will change over time. The player must learn by himself how the game works through observation and trials-and-errors. The game might be confusing and hard to follow at first, but it will all make sense in the end.
